title: Custom Cockpit Risers
carddescription: Due to compatibility issues between the vision aero bars I use and the bike I have, I have had to make my own custom risers.

title: BTA Bottle Lid
carddescription: A custom lid that screws onto a waterbottle with a straw.

title: ENVE Aero Stem Redesign
carddescription: Fixes aero-bar compatibility for the ENVE Aero Stem.

title: Mustang Showdown 2024
carddescription: A super-sprint collegiate triathlon I hosted.
featuredText: Here’s a bit more context on why this was critical for my Ironman prep…

title: Race Results Website (All Results)
carddescription: I have been frustrated for years that there is no good place to get all of the race results I want, that also provides an indepth analysis of the race results.
featuredText: One of my main projects is getting this up and running, with at least the WCCTC results and athlete. I am having to learn the basics of database management and setup.

title: Mustang Showdown Race Manager Program
carddescription: A small python program to manage preliminary race results for multi-round triathlon events

title: Indoor Trainer Table
carddescription: A small table for indoor training.

title: WUI Firefighter Respiratory Proteciton System
carddescription: A respritory protective device for wildland and wildland urban interface firefighters
